Candana Sutta：1．Candana Sutta．-The devaputta Candana visits the Buddha at Jetavana and asks him how one can cross the flood （ogha） and not be drowned．By constant effort and destruction of craving，says the Buddha （S．i．53）．

2．Candana Sutta．-Candana visits Mahā Moggallāna and asks him why some beings are born in heaven．S．iv．280．
